title: Awesome List Updates on Sep 08, 2022

items.title: Awesome Selfhosted
items.content_text:
### Software / Communication - Social Networks and Forums

*   [Zusam (‚≠ê205)](https://github.com/zusam/zusam) - Free and open-source way to self-host private forums for groups of friends or family. ([Demo](https://demo.zusam.org)) `AGPL-3.0` `PHP`

### Software / Document Management - Institutional Repository and Digital Library Software

*   [Fedora Commons Repository](https://wiki.lyrasis.org/display/FF/Fedora+Repository+Home) - Robust and modular repository system for the management and dissemination of digital content especially suited for digital libraries and archives, both for access and preservation. ([Source Code (‚≠ê224)](https://github.com/fcrepo/fcrepo)) `Apache-2.0` `Java`
*   [Islandora](https://www.islandora.ca/) - Drupal module for browsing and managing Fedora-based digital repositories. ([Demo](https://sandbox.islandora.ca/), [Source Code (‚≠ê155)](https://github.com/Islandora/islandora)) `GPL-3.0` `PHP`
items.content_html:
Software / Communication - Social Networks and Forums

  • Zusam (‚≠ê205) - Free and open-source way to self-host private forums for groups of friends or family. (Demo) AGPL-3.0 PHP

Software / Document Management - Institutional Repository and Digital Library Software

  • Fedora Commons Repository - Robust and modular repository system for the management and dissemination of digital content especially suited for digital libraries and archives, both for access and preservation. (Source Code (‚≠ê224)) Apache-2.0 Java
  • Islandora - Drupal module for browsing and managing Fedora-based digital repositories. (Demo, Source Code (‚≠ê155)) GPL-3.0 PHP

items.title: Awesome Blazor
items.content_text:
### Articles / Others

*   [Authenticate Blazor WebAssembly with Azure Static Web Apps](https://anthonychu.ca/post/blazor-auth-azure-static-web-apps/) - July 22, 2022 - Azure Static Web Apps is a great place to host Blazor WebAssembly apps. Among Static Web Apps' many features, it has built-in support for authentication using social logins. In this article, we'll look at how we can take advantage of Static Web Apps Authentication in our Blazor WebAssembly apps. By Anthony Chu, from Microsoft.
items.content_html:
Articles / Others

  • Authenticate Blazor WebAssembly with Azure Static Web Apps - July 22, 2022 - Azure Static Web Apps is a great place to host Blazor WebAssembly apps. Among Static Web Apps' many features, it has built-in support for authentication using social logins. In this article, we'll look at how we can take advantage of Static Web Apps Authentication in our Blazor WebAssembly apps. By Anthony Chu, from Microsoft.

items.title: Awesome Zsh Plugins
items.content_text:
### Completions / [superconsole](https://github.com/alexchmykhalo/superconsole) - Windows-only

*   [complete-mac (‚≠ê7)](https://github.com/vitkabele/complete-mac) - Add completions for macOS `ioreg`, `lsmp`, `scselect`, `system_profiler` and `tmutil` commands.
*   [prettier (‚≠ê0)](https://github.com/sambergo/zsh-prettier-completion/) - Tab completion for [prettier](https://prettier.io/.)
items.content_html:
Completions / superconsole - Windows-only

  • complete-mac (‚≠ê7) - Add completions for macOS ioreg, lsmp, scselect, system_profiler and tmutil commands.
  • prettier (‚≠ê0) - Tab completion for prettier

items.title: Awesome Pcaptools
items.content_text:
### Traffic Capture

*   [PCAPdroid (‚≠ê3k)](https://github.com/emanuele-f/PCAPdroid): PCAPdroid is an Android app which lets you monitor and export the network traffic of your device without root. Traffic can be dumped in the PCAP format to be analyzed with popular tools like Wireshark, even in real time. The built-in traffic monitor lets you detect suspicious connections made by user and system apps.
items.content_html:
Traffic Capture

  • PCAPdroid (‚≠ê3k): PCAPdroid is an Android app which lets you monitor and export the network traffic of your device without root. Traffic can be dumped in the PCAP format to be analyzed with popular tools like Wireshark, even in real time. The built-in traffic monitor lets you detect suspicious connections made by user and system apps.
